Sentencas: Electric conductions in La0.9Sr0.1Ga1-xMgxO3-delta (LSGM; x=0 and 0.1) have been elucidated by ac and do methods as a function of temperature.
Titulo: Electric conductions in La0.9Sr0.1GaO3-δ and La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.9Mg0.1O3-δ

Sentencas: Using complex-plane impedance analyses and dielectric relaxation processes along with do results, activation energy for electric conduction, migration energy of O2- ions (E-M), and energy required to create a free mobile oxygen vacancy which assists O2- migration (E-O) within intragrains and in boundaries have been obtained separately.
Titulo: Electric conductions in La0.9Sr0.1GaO3-δ and La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.9Mg0.1O3-δ

Sentencas: Dielectric dispersion due to a distribution of relaxation times in boundaries is observed.
Titulo: Electric conductions in La0.9Sr0.1GaO3-δ and La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.9Mg0.1O3-δ

Sentencas: The activation energy for each electric conduction is nearly equal to sum of E-M and E-O. Lattice distortion due to a large difference in ionic radii of Mg2+ and Ga3+ brings about high migration energy within intragrains in x=0.1 specimen compared with that of x=0.
Titulo: Electric conductions in La0.9Sr0.1GaO3-δ and La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.9Mg0.1O3-δ

Sentencas: Such high migration energy has an adverse effect on improvement of ionic conductivities but excess oxygen vacancies compensate this adverse effect.
Titulo: Electric conductions in La0.9Sr0.1GaO3-δ and La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.9Mg0.1O3-δ

Sentencas: In boundaries, disturbances in coulombic potential fields due to disordered ionic arrangements discourage ionic conductions.
Titulo: Electric conductions in La0.9Sr0.1GaO3-δ and La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.9Mg0.1O3-δ
Electric conductions in La0.9Sr0.1GaO3-δ and La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.9Mg0.1O3-δ
